testCase.name: EtzEncryptor Object must not be empty
Reference generateEncryptedTerminalPin module in EtzEncryptor Object
Reference maskEncryptedTerminalPin module in EtzEncryptor Object
Reference unmaskEncryptedTerminalPin module in EtzEncryptor Object
generateEncryptedTerminalPin function must only take 2 arguments
generateEncryptedTerminalPin function must not return undefined
key16Bytes function must only take 1 argument
key16Bytes function must not return null
key16Bytes function must not return undefined
key16Bytes function must return a 16 bytes string from etzSecretKey
isBase64 function must only take 1 argument
isBase64 function must not return null
isBase64 function must not return undefined
Encrypted Output is a base64 string
